Text: RE Potential Houston Meeting DatesCarl Either date works fine for me right now But I would prefer an afternoon or a late morning am or after meeting I also would like Jean Adams to be available Let me know what you think Thanks Janet Original Message From Carl Sulzer GREER FuelPlant mailto Sent Friday October PM To Giron Darron C Bowers Janet Lewis Mary Jo Subject Potential Houston Meeting Dates There are a growing number of things for us to discuss relative to gas supply for Pleasant Valley Station I would like to suggest the following dates to meet in Houston Choice November a morning meeting Choice Novemer a morning meeting Please let me know and reply all in your response if one or both dates work I will put together an agenda of the items for discussion
